TopicTitle: Feedback: extendable engines extends while not decopuled.

Articles.Content:
Made some bug hunt for extendable engines, this isn't bug but i tried to make lift from those engines. It doesn't work like expected:

You can extend stacked engines, they doesn't raise vessel but they intersects eachother.

Expected behauviour:

1)Whole ship would stretch in height.

or

2)Engine cannot be extended while they are attached to both nodes.

 

If 1 would be true, then power of bell extented motors should be calculated.
